medium: Mahogany with satinwood and ebony inlay, metal works, and glass
title: Barometer
description: banjo-shaped, mahogany inlaid with satinwood and ebony rosettes top and bottom. oval medalions containing shells inlaid above dial on either side of bulb; hairline satinwood and ebony inlay around entire edge; broken pediment top; name on dial \'Gugerd & Belottil, #5 Union Court, Holborn Hill, London; glass from front of bulb area replaced; old glass stored in D11.4 MS
creditline: Gift of James. F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
